ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 16
Message-ID: <17248.16.50.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 14 Feb 1999 20:31:31 -0500
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Give me a break.............................


>From: "Sven Lederhogen" <jokercheese@...>
>
>Look. I don't have any viruses on computer and I don't want to give any 
>viruses to any one else. I just want levels for gladiators. I'm no 
>anarchist and i'm not a hacker. I just want gladiator levels. Does any 
>one have gladiators levels that I can play or not????

Actually, I don't mind sending levels; as long as nobody's going to sue for
whatever's on them, it doesn't bother me :)

At the moment, the "Tryxian Chronicles" are the main user-made levels for
Gladiator. However, one of the users of this mailing list is working to compile
some of the levels that we've received, but never had time to put up. He thinks
he might have something done by the end of Monday, and while I certainly
wouldn't hold him to a time scale (that'd be hypocritical, eh? ;->), I wouldn't
be surprised if he posts something about them soon. So watch this list over the
next few days and let's see what develops.

--Tom
